snippet: The coming weekend will offer two strong contenders to join the top-grossing Independence Day weekend films: “Despicable Me 2,” the sequel to the 2010 film, and “The Lone Ranger,” which stars Johnny Depp.
lead_paragraph: The coming weekend will offer two strong contenders to join the top-grossing Independence Day weekend films: “Despicable Me 2,” the sequel to the 2010 film, and “The Lone Ranger,” which stars Johnny Depp.
